name: girl & the rain
description:
Created for the "Not a Game Jam Game Jam" 2019.

This game is written in pure Windows Batch.

girl & the rain is a short, guided interaction about watching the rain. It features 3 story paths chosen randomly every rainfall; a unique colour set, soothing music, and a smooth, smooth rainfall.

Sometimes, we fail to see the beauty of simplicity in nature. Drops of water, falling from the sky. How alluring can it get?

The game includes a serene soundtrack + rain sounds, so remember to turn on the volume when playing.

Having fun :)

Windows 10 only, unfortunately.
